The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: MT2.1.web.map v1.0.


> Coastlines were mapped with a 5 km buffer applied between 60°S and 60°N..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- Mapbox tileset ([GeoTIFF version uploaded to Mapbox](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.MT2_1_web_map))
 - Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091113))
 - Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**MT2.1 Coastal shrublands and grasslands**](/efg-info/MT2_1.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Indicative Map (**code: MT2.1.IM.orig**, version v1.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: MT2.1.web.map**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

MT2.1.IM.orig (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/MT2.1.IM.orig_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934)
MT2.1.web.map (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/MT2.1.web.map_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419) :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091113) :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.MT2_1_web_map) :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
